channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: On Eve of Tariff Deadline, Trump’s Trade War Faces Key Court Test
item.description: A federal appeals panel will hear arguments from states and businesses that seek to invalidate the president’s tariffs.

item.title: The transformative power of keeping a daily journal
item.description: In a new book, writer Suleika Jaouad explains why journaling is a form of alchemy — and offers tips on how to reignite your practice if you're feeling...

item.title: After Backlash, Ukraine Votes to Restore Watchdogs’ Powers
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky’s move last week to neuter two anticorruption agencies drew the country’s first street protests since Russia’s invasion.

item.title: Not enough money for retirement? NPR wants to hear from you
item.description: Many adults over age 50 either have no retirement savings or worry they won't be able to support themselves during their post-working years. If that's...

item.title: The Fed holds interest rates steady. And, Texas releases bid for new redistricting map
item.description: The Federal Reserve voted yesterday to keep interest rates steady, despite the president calling for lower rates. And, Texas Republicans proposed a ne...

item.title: Russian Missile and Drone Attack Pummels Kyiv, Killing at Least 7
item.description: The assault came soon after President Trump threatened new sanctions against Moscow if the bloodshed didn’t let up.

item.title: Father James Martin has taken heat for his LGBTQ acceptance

item.title: A Trade Deadline Frenzy, and Trump’s Push to Redraw Congressional Maps
item.description: Plus, why the tsunami wasn’t bigger.

item.title: Russian Drones and Missiles Strike Kyiv
item.description: Russia launched a barrage of drones and missiles on the Ukrainian capital early Thursday, killing several people and injuring dozens.
